sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const HooksApiView=(props)=> { //State management const [users,setUsers]=useState({ id:'', name:'', email:'', location:'', course:'', phone:'' }); //Takes parameter value from URL let { idno }=useParams(); //RESTAPI_CALLS useEffect(()=>{ axios .get(`http://localhost:3003/react173/${idno}`) .then( (apiresult)=> setUsers(apiresult.data) ) },[]) return (<>
ID {users.id}
NAME {users.name}
EMAIL {users.email}
LOCATION {users.location}
COURSE {users.course}
PHONE {users.phone}
GOTO BACK
) } export default HooksApiView
